articles.description: She is the first artist to claim all 10 of the top spots on the US Hot 100 chart.
articles.content:
Taylor Swift has become the first artist in history to claim every slot in the top 10 of the US singles chart. 
She overtakes Drake, who held the previous record of nine top 10 singles in September … [+3505 chars]
